title: Health Tech Breakthroughs in 2024
author: Riya Rao
body: The health tech industry is experiencing a wave of innovation, with new technologies revolutionizing patient care and healthcare delivery. This article examines some of the most significant health tech breakthroughs expected in 2024, including advancements in telemedicine, wearable health devices, and AI-driven diagnostics. These technologies are improving patient outcomes, streamlining healthcare operations, and making healthcare more accessible. The Global Health Summit in Geneva will address these topics and provide insights into the future of health tech.
